name: loop de l'eau
description:
rain, water, steam, cloud

the water rhythm island

stuck in a chill loop

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loop-de-leau

CONTROLS.1:

Simulate - Nothing (let the simulation flow).

CONTROLS.2:

Horizontal Flow - Mouse Left + Right

Environmental Flow - Mouse Up + Down

Cloud Rain - Click/Space

Start/Pause - Enter/P

SOURCE:

https://github.com/couleurs/loopdeleau

CREATORS:

https://github.com/couleurs

https://github.com/archgame

MUSIC:

https://asurarevolver.net/album/rainforest-hill-i-ii
